name: Cloud Academy Inc.
description: Provider of an online learning platform designed to helps both companies and individuals to learn cloud computing technologies. The company's online learning platform helps both companies and individual users learn everything about cloud computing, provides content and training and helps experts prove their knowledge by solving tests and helps companies to easily find them, enabling companies and individuals to learn cloud computing technology.
one_liner: Provider of an online learning platform designed to helps both companies and individuals to learn cloud computing technologies. The company's online learning platform helps both companies and individual users learn everything about cloud computing, provides content and training and helps experts prove their knowledge by solving tests and helps companies to easily find them, enabling companies and individuals to learn cloud computing technology.
